attributes.additional_details:
Due to the uprising of recent rioting and the people involved saying they have no prospects in life after leaving school; then I propose EVERYONE leaving school without setting up a full time job or University should go through National Service!

We the undersigned would like to see National Service brought back for those who are not willing to contribute to society and their own development.
There should be clauses written in that people who get a job or go to Uni to get out of national service then quite without something else lined up or bunk off should be drafted to do their time with the Service, this should be the case for everyone up to the age of 21yrs or maybe even up to 25yr.

This will help society and communities with youth discipline and respect!
